scenario_name: Verify User Based Security Groups Assignments & Verify Role Assignments
task_step:
Run the report "View Security Group" and select the respective security group:
For User Based Security Groups (i.e. Administrators), select "Members" to view the list of assigned users.
For Role Based Security Groups (i.e. Recruiter, Recruiting Coordinator), select "Assignable Role" to get the list of current role assignments. Verify that the Assignee(s) are assigned to the appropriate Organization(s).

Security Domains:
